department: Coordination and Logistic Serivilounces for Space Apps
short_summary: Coordination and logistic Services for the space Apps Challenge virtual event
full_summary:
### Coordination and Logistics Services for the Space Apps Challenge Virtual Event
#### Request for Proposal (RFP)
#### Solicitation Number: 9F032-22-0077
#### Issued: August 24, 2022
#### Closing Date: September 6, 2022, 2:00 pm EDT

The Canadian Space Agency (CSA) is seeking to engage a Service Provider to deliver coordination and logistics services for the 2022 Space Apps Challenge Virtual Event. The event aims to bring together participants, experts, and coaches to develop innovative solutions in response to space-related challenges.

### Scope of Work

* The Service Provider will collaborate with the CSA and local organizing committees to develop and implement a plan for the virtual event, including participant prospecting, activity management, and evaluation sessions.
* The Service Provider will provide coordination and logistics services for the virtual event, ensuring a seamless and engaging experience for participants.
* The Service Provider will have experience in using and sharing space and scientific data through outreach activities and delivering virtual events through digital platforms.

### Eligibility

To be considered, Service Providers must submit a proposal that meets the requirements outlined in the RFP document. Proposals must be submitted electronically through the Canada Buys website by September 6, 2022, 2:00 pm EDT.

### Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation of proposals will be based on the following criteria:

* Relevance (20%)
* Technical Approach (30%)
* Past Performance (20%)
* Price (30%)

### Additional Information

* The Service Provider must have a valid Lawson Culture and Diversity Assessment result and a valid standing offer profile with Public Services and Procurement Canada.
* The Service Provider must provide a satisfactory National Industrial Security Program Clearance.

For further information, please contact:

Julie Mercier
Contracting Authority
telephone: 514-244-6852
email: [julie.mercier@asc-csa.gc.ca](mailto:julie.mercier@asc-csa.gc.ca)
### Documents Available

The RFP document and any amendments can be found on the Canada Buys website. [1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/24/03ed7c8c3305f3557323d170008c9af6/9f032-22-0077_-_coordination_and_logistic_services.pdf) [2](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/
